title: Faith healing parents jailed after newborn’s death
itunes:title: Faith healing parents jailed after newborn’s death
description:
Two Oregon parents face murder charges after one of their twins died hours after her birth. None of the Followers of Christ church members at the home where the babies were born called 911 for help after the girl stopped breathing, according to investigators. The mom’s sister is already in prison for the death of her baby under similar circumstances. Nancy Grace and Alan Duke discuss this case, as well as the story of Josh Duggar, the former reality TV star who wants police to pay him for the release of information about his alleged molestation of children.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
